verses.kjv: O LORD, our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.
verses.ct: LORD, our Lord, how magnificent is your name across the whole earth! You have displayed your glory above the heavens.

verses.kjv: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.
verses.ct: From the mouths of children and infants you have established praise because of your opponents, to silence the enemy and the one seeking revenge.

verses.kjv: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;
verses.ct: When I look up at your heavens, shaped by your fingers — the moon and the stars that you put in place —

verses.kjv: What is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him?
verses.ct: what are human beings that you think about them? What are mortals that you care for them?

verses.kjv: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.
verses.ct: Yet you made them only slightly lower than the angels, and you crowned them with glory and honor.

verses.kjv: Thou madest him to have dominion over the works of thy hands; thou hast put all things under his feet:
verses.ct: You gave them authority over everything your hands have made; you placed all things under their control:

verses.kjv: All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;
verses.ct: all flocks and herds, and also the wild animals,

verses.kjv: The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea, and whatsoever passeth through the paths of the seas.
verses.ct: the birds in the sky, the fish in the ocean, and every creature that moves through the currents of the seas.

verses.kjv: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth!
verses.ct: LORD, our Lord, how magnificent is your name across the whole earth!
